b.manager LIKE '%' + #{manager} + '%'
AND b.requestDate >= #{startDate}
AND b.requestDate <= #{endDate}
AND b.sub LIKE '%' + #{sub} + '%'
AND b.processState LIKE '%' + #{status} + '%'
AND b.dpId LIKE '%' + #{dpId} + '%'
